value:
A Hero whose deeds echo through
legend... That is a far cry from who
I am. An idea distant as the horizon.

Since I cannot wield a divine weapon,
I must pour myself into studying all
the useful skills I can find.

Have you been getting enough rest?
There are limits to what tea can do
to keep you awake...

Doing some horseback training, I have
realized I would like to lead a troop of
lance knights...like my father did.

The number of books in this castle is
incredible! I must be sure to study
nation-building during my time here...

Greetings! I am Leif. I am making my
rounds, and I wanted to thank you for
supporting $Nf.

I will be a beacon of hope for all!
Please, watch over me, Father...

This is no time to panic. I must simply
take one step at a time...

I will be unable to help anyone at
this rate...
I strive to meet your expectations.

My name is Leif, heir to Leonster...
Though I am yet unworthy of the
title, I will do all I can to earn it.

Ah. I was just musing on how glad
I am at being summoned here to
this world.$k$pHeroes from across many worlds and
many times... Watching them is truly
valuable to me.$k$pThough I carry no divine weapon,
I cannot let that hold me back! I have
a strength that is unique to me.$k$pIt is not a weapon or martial art...but
the vision to overcome the past and
create a new country...as it should be.$k$pWhen the time comes, I hope it will
be enough—and that I do Dáinn and
Njörun's legacy justice...
はぁっ！
せやぁっ！
うああっ！
This wound...!
Here we go!
Hoist the flag!
On my blade, I swear it!
If I must, I'll do it myself!
I must fight...
Haha
I am Leif, heir to the throne of Leonster. My duty is to become a ruler worthy of that name.
Whoa, there! Your greeting is a strange one.
Legendary Hero? That's definitely not a title I can claim.
A Hero is like a vision that appears when the time is ripe. My mentor told me this.
Lord Seliph is a great man. Me? Well...I have a lot of growing up to do.
I am well aware of the suffering of the people, and the depth of their grief.
I will protect you, without fail!
Got it.
Forward!
Friends! I will not abandon you!
